name: Re-wind (NexxusGameing)
description:
A Game made for Participation in the Brackeys Game jam.

This was coded in Pure Java and I worked really hard on it.

Hope you enjoy.

How to use:

when downloading the game check to see if your computer runs 64bit or 32bit download the corrosponding file

NB. 32 bit May not work, I was unable to test it As I use a 64 bit.

To Play the Game you will have to download Latest JDK version. You Can download it here.

64 bit: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jdk14-downloads.html

32 bit: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/javase-jdk8-downloads.html 

I mistakendly uploaded the bug fixing version of the Game,  So you now start 2 minutes into wave 2 Good luck <:
